section.name: Tutorials
section.p: Ultimately you will want to publish your content to a website, intranet or extranet. Hippo ECM comes with a set of tools and components to allow rapid development of websites, the Hippo Site Toolkit 2. This section helps you get started with the Hippo Site Toolkit 2, and develop your own websites in a Hippo ECM enviroment.

ul.li: Start a project - Setting up a new project with Hippo Site Toolkit 2 using a Maven archetype
Hello World - Adding a simple page to your website saying hello to the world
Create a Facebook - Learn how to create a new document type, and how to use it in your website, by adding a simple facebook to the sample website.
